sentences.sContent: Air bags are a standard feature in most new cars.
sentences.sCn: 气囊是大多数新车的标准配置。

sentences.sContent: Striped tails are a common feature of many animals.
sentences.sCn: 尾巴上有条纹是许多动物的共同特征。

sentences.sContent: The hotel’s only redeeming features (= things that make it acceptable ) were that it was cheap and near the city centre.
sentences.sCn: 这家旅馆仅有的可取之处就是价格低廉并且靠近市中心。

sentences.sContent: One of the distinguishing features (= features that are different from other things of the same sort ) of modern banking is its dependence on computers.
sentences.sCn: 现代银行业的显著特征之一就是依赖电脑。

sentences.sContent: It's a great film and it features a Spanish actor who is going to be a world star within a year.
sentences.sCn: 那是一部精彩的电影，它由一位西班牙演员主演，他一年之内就会成为国际明星。

sentences.sContent: The hour-long programme will be updated each week and feature highlights from recent games.
sentences.sCn: 这个一小时的节目将每周更新，重点介绍近期比赛的精彩部分。

sentences.sContent: ...and weren't just a feature of a small group of misbehaving kids...

...were only too willing to accept hundreds of billions of dollars from the government in the aid programs that have been a recurring feature of the global economy since the beginning of the Thatcher-Reagan era of "free" markets and deregulation...
...The most striking feature is the caption under the picture...
...The ideal of country life reflected in art and literature serves as the significant feature of Chinese civilization...
...One feature of a good grading system is that those measured by it generally regard it as fair and reasonable—not the case here...

synos.tran: 特色，特征；容貌；特写或专题节目

phrases.pCn: 主要特征；主要特点；主景；功能特点
专用功能部件；特别策划；特别收录
设计特点；结构特点；设计数据；设计形体
地貌；地表特征；场地地貌
语义特征；语意特征；语义要素

words.tran: 特定的；被作为特色的；有…的面貌特征的
非常轻的人或物；不重要的人；轻量级选手
使…有特色；起重要作用（feature的过去分词）

trans.tranCn: 特征，特色；面貌；特写，专题节目；故事片
trans.tranOther: a part of something that you notice because it seems important, interesting, or typical
When something such as a film or exhibition features a particular person or thing, they are an important part of it
